verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [ARG1: he would demand an investigation into whether the FBI had placed surveillance on his 2016 campaign — and whether such activity was ordered by his predecessor] .

President Donald Trump said on Sunday he [V: would] demand an investigation into whether the FBI had placed surveillance on his 2016 campaign — and whether such activity was ordered by his predecessor .

President Donald Trump said on Sunday he would demand an investigation into whether the FBI [V: had] placed surveillance on his 2016 campaign — and whether such activity was ordered by his predecessor .

President Donald Trump said on Sunday he would demand an investigation into whether [ARG0: the FBI] had [V: placed] [ARG1: surveillance] [ARG2: on his 2016 campaign] — and whether such activity was ordered by his predecessor .

President Donald Trump said on Sunday he would demand an investigation into whether the FBI had placed surveillance on his 2016 campaign — and whether such activity [V: was] ordered by his predecessor .

President Donald Trump said on Sunday he would demand an investigation into whether the FBI had placed surveillance on his 2016 campaign — and whether [ARG1: such activity] was [V: ordered] [ARG0: by his predecessor] .
